items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +19 to Intelligence
20% increased Lightning Damage
39% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

items.name: Badge of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: Your Maximum Frenzy Charges is equal to your Maximum Power Charges
10% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate of Travel Skills per Frenzy Charge
10% increased Effect of Elusive on you per Power Charge
23% chance to lose a Frenzy Charge when you use a Travel Skill
23% chance to lose a Power Charge when you gain Elusive
flavourText: Greater than any blade, agility and intellect will be your weapons.

items.typeLine: Ample Quicksilver Flask of the Kaleidoscope
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: +33 to Maximum Charges
30% additional Elemental Resistances during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Taste of Hate
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: 10% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 11% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

items.name: Death Weaver
explicitMods: +10% to Quality of Socketed Gems
Adds 7 to 13 Physical Damage
19% increased Lightning Damage
23% increased Projectile Speed

items.name: Rage Song
explicitMods: 13% increased Spell Damage
15% increased Critical Strike Chance for Spells
+22 to maximum Mana
59% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
15% increased Stun Duration on Enemies

items.name: Atziri's Promise
enchantMods: Reused at the end of this Flask's effect
explicitMods: Gain 8% of Elemental Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
2% of Chaos Damage Leeched as Life during Effect
Gain 8% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage during effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: "Death needs not your understanding. It needs only your loyalty."

items.name: Call of the Brotherhood
explicitMods: +23 to Intelligence
21% increased Lightning Damage
33% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
48% of Lightning Damage Converted to Cold Damage
Your spells have 100% chance to Shock against Frozen Enemies
flavourText: so that they may recognize each other
across any distance of time or travel.

items.name: Malachai's Loop
implicitMods: You take 28% reduced Extra Damage from Critical Strikes
explicitMods: 244% increased Energy Shield
+2 to Maximum Power Charges
20% chance to gain a Power Charge on Hit
15% increased Spell Damage per Power Charge
Lose all Power Charges on reaching Maximum Power Charges
Shocks you when you reach Maximum Power Charges
flavourText: It is our fragile reality that imposes boundaries.

socketedItems.secDescrText: An icy blast explodes around the caster, dealing cold damage to enemies, and leaving behind a whirling vortex which deals cold damage over time and chills enemies caught in it. If the caster targets near their Frostbolt projectiles, it will explode from a number of those projectiles instead, destroying them.
explicitMods: Deals 1209 to 1813 Cold Damage
Base duration is 3.00 seconds
Deals 2317.2 Base Cold Damage per second
Modifiers to Spell Damage apply to this Skill's Damage Over Time effect
20% less Area of Effect when Cast on Frostbolt
76% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
Can explode from up to 5 Frostbolt Projectiles
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that can chill enemies or create chilling areas.
explicitMods: 44% increased Effect of Chill inflicted with Supported Skills
Enemies Chilled by Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Enemies in Chilling Areas from Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect
Supported Skills deal 14% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill that hits enemies or inflicts ailments
explicitMods: 54% increased Duration of Ailments inflicted with Supported Skills
Supported Skills have 54% increased Effect of non-Damaging Ailments on Enemies
Supported Skills deal 19% more Damage with Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.
